Address.label: Address
Address.value: ONE HARTFORD PLAZA, HARTFORD, Connecticut, 06155, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: The Hartford Financial Services Group Inc offers a diverse range of property and casualty insurance, group benefits, and mutual fund services to a customer base of individuals and corporations. It operates in five segments: Commercial Lines, Personal Lines, Property & Casualty Other Operations, Group Benefits, and Hartford Funds, as well as a Corporate category.
